text: They don't have such arrangement nw so no point. It confuses reader if they are foreigners who are unable to work & doing so illegally
Err. I think DHL does employ foreign delivery logistics workers. Correct me if i am wrong. But they are on employment rules and a basic pay package
There are also small SMC logistics companies who provide foreign workers as riders for delivery companies like Grab also.

Lalamove they don't have such arrangements. The question is when they have an order that no one wants to accept  they try engage other platforms or maybe these small SMC companies. These companies will deploy their foreigners to pickup the order.

companies like DHL or small MNC companies employs their own worker for their own deliveries  that's ok. E.g. designated driver for one particular company and only do delivery for that one company. Gig jobs such as lalamove/grab/food panda are not allowed for foreigners as they do not have such arrangements.  This is to protect the locals livelihood
Normal company arrangements/rules different from gig jobs platform
Problem is gig economy companies play the game of "sublet the job" to other small companies who hire foreigners. GoGo is one example
The moment u sublet a job to these company  u will see foreigner go pickup
First 10mins foc for customers lor. Subsequent 10mins then charges $2 extra. Malls parking only 10mins grace  means confirm kena parking charges. 😑
